dialogue.introduction: I'm Shirayuki. I'll be in your care today as well.
dialogue.library_intro: Special-type destroyer, 2nd ship, Shirayuki. At the start of the war, I participated in many operations. After that, I was the flagship of the escort in Operation 81 that transported troop reinforcements.
dialogue.secretary1: Thank you for the good work. Would you like some tea? Thank you for the good work. Shall I pour you some tea?
dialogue.secretary2: Yes, the 11st Destroyer Division is ready to go.
dialogue.secretaryidle: This is for Fubuki-chan, and this is for Hatsuyuki-chan. Ok this is perfect. Now, I also need to- fufufu, I am now ready for any command!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, you're always so overworked. Here, I prepared hot tea for you. Please take a while to rest, and look after yourself.
dialogue.wedding: Being next to Commander's side, helping you out is my happiness. If only I can help and support you more..
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander, analyzing the report was it? I have gathered them right here.
dialogue.equipment1: For further success' I'll continue trying hard.
dialogue.equipment2: I'm happy...! Thank you very much...!
dialogue.supply: For future success' I'll try hard!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I think it can be repaired immediately.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm sorry for the nuisance. I'll rest for a bit.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has finished it's repair.
dialogue.ship_construction: Oh! The construction of the new ship seems to have completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Everyone, have you dumped the combustible material already?
dialogue.night_battle: The true power of a special-type destroyer, I want to show it.
dialogue.night_attack: I have a feeling the barrage is thin.
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I have a feeling the barrage is thin.
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I have a feeling the barrage is thin.
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I have a feeling the barrage is thin.
dialogue.mvp: I too, am happy that I was able to take part and support.
dialogue.sunk: N-no... I still haven't done anything...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Commander.... Um, I have some sweets here for you. If you'd like, please have them.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, today is a special day right? Shirayuki is happy too, how wonderful.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: There are tactics for the days in the rain. It was you, Commander, that taught us so. It is okay. Let us go together even on a rainy day.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Ugh, I don't like flying insects this season. Let's burn a swirly-type incense! Leave it to Shirayuki to handle the big task!
dialogue.christmas_2015: I wonder if it's fine to get this merry just because it's Christmas. Still, I guess it's alright, definitely. I mean, just look.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Yes, I think I have cleaned up without a hitch. Commander, won't you go buy New Year fortunes lottery with me? I always bought it every year, to be honest.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, please take care of me this year as well. If it is fine with you, will you play Japanese Badminton with me? I'll call Fubuki-chan to come as well.
